MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-DEC-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn, affecting properties in Russel Drive, Ceri Road and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs needed to our underground cable network, and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:56AM on 12th December 2020
